func.title: InsertVertex

param.name: index
param.desc: Index of the vertex to be removed, ranges from 0 to GetVertexNum.

param.name: x
param.desc: X coordinate, relative to the object center.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y coordinate, relative to the object center.

func.desc: Inserts a new vertex to an object.
func.remark: Notice: with any vertex updated caused by stretching or rotation of the object (e.g. building or growth) the vertices will be reset to their original defined position unless a special vertex mode is selected.
